data.author: DeSheng E.

changelog.release_notes: - Vibrates a short pulse when bus is 1 minute away, and a long pulse when bus is arriving.
- Add a vibration notification to alert you when the selected bus service is arriving in 1 minute.

- Differentiate no ETA and Not In Service 
- Bug Fixes
- Now shows version number on status bar for Pebble Time users

- Bug fixes
- Improve reliability of distance tracking
- Bug fix for WMB? being stuck at searching for bus stops nearby. Thanks to @yjwong for notifying me.

- Fix arrangement of the bus services
- Increase stability to account for discrepancies from the LTA servers

- Show bus services even when time estimate is not available or service not operation.
- Refined alert system for the alighting stop

- Alerts will only be triggered 1 stop or 1km away, whichever is closer to the designated stop.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Enable with more flexibility for backlight due to Pebble Time Firmware 3.2

- New feature: Destination reminder
- Improved stability
- Bug fixes

- Shows splash screen when communicating with server
- Enhance readability of long bus stop names
- Increase maximum number of nearby bus stops shown 
- Misc. bug fixes
Bug fix: Duplicate bus services shown

- Improve stability
- Include messages when bus stops are not found
- Unnamed bus stops are now identified with the bus stop number.

data.description:
Bus Arrival Estimated Timing (SG). Now, you can choose your destination and get reminded to alight! Perfect for those who prefer to catch a quick snooze. ;)

Basic Usage:
- Choose your bus stop
- Shake to update information, otherwise, information is updated every minute.
- Select the bus service you're boarding
- Select your preferred stop to alight
- The app will now go into monitoring mode, and display the remaining distance to your destination. Your watch will vibrate continuously when you are reaching until you exit from the monitoring screen screen or WMB?.

Credits:
- LTA
- busrouter.sg

latest_release.release_notes: - Vibrates a short pulse when bus is 1 minute away, and a long pulse when bus is arriving.

data.title: Where My Bus? (SG)
